description.value:
Your Inspire Courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

While your allies are affected by your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Inspire Courage], their weapon strikes and unarmed attacks deal an additional [[/r 1d6[sonic]]] damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Discordant Voice]
